unnormalised: Arre baba, heard about this new strain of flu doing the rounds in Delhi? They're calling it "Dilli Belly 2.0" - original, I know! Dr. Sharma at AIIMS says avoid street food to prevent catching it, as if that's even possible! Anyways, symptoms include fever > 100Â°F, extreme weakness, and an uncontrollable urge to dance to Bollywood music (okay, maybe I added that last one). Seriously though, mask up, wash your hands with Dettol (Rs. 45 for the small bottle), and lay off the golgappas for a bit, okay? Prevention is better than ending up with a doc bill of Rs. 500, ya?
normalised: Arre baba, heard about this new strain of flu doing the rounds in Delhi? They're calling it "Dilli Belly two point zero" - original, I know! Doctor Sharma at A-I-I-M-S says avoid street food to prevent catching it, as if that's even possible! Anyways, symptoms include fever greater than one hundred degree fahrenheit, extreme weakness, and an uncontrollable urge to dance to Bollywood music (okay, maybe I added that last one). Seriously though, mask up, wash your hands with Dettol (rupees forty five for the small bottle), and lay off the golgappas for a bit, okay? Prevention is better than ending up with a doc bill of rupees five hundred, ya?
